tool_description: Analyzes soil composition and geological conditions at proposed sites to determine foundation requirements and structural stability for network infrastructure.

analysis_depth.description: Soil analysis depth in meters (1 to 20)

error_messages: Invalid coordinates: Latitude must be between -90 and 90, longitude between -180 and 180.
Invalid analysis depth: Depth must be between 1 and 20 meters.
Geological data unavailable: Soil composition data not available for this location.
Analysis depth exceeded: Requested depth exceeds available geological survey data.
usage: Provide site coordinates and optionally specify analysis depth. The tool returns detailed soil composition and geological stability information for foundation planning.

soil_type.description: Primary soil type: clay, sand, rock, mixed

water_table_depth.description: Depth to water table in meters

stability_rating.description: Geological stability: excellent, good, fair, poor
